Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But a great movie film-wise ! My meter was off to 9/10 because all of these things have been done so many times before and films like Interstellar are able to do it way better.
I'm going with six point five out of ten. It's not Academy Award. But this film always remembers

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find.
